name: Dylan
placeOfBirth: New Brandyville, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
description: Dylan is a gray-eyed llama with red hair, standing 176 cm tall. Originally from New Brandyville, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands, Dylan enjoys wood carving, hiking, cooking. Known for their mischievous and mischievous personality, Dylan is a beloved member of the llama community.
